00043 #define MIN_CLIP_WARNING 10
00044 
00045 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00046 
00047 
00048 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00049 // CONSTRUCTORS, DESTRUCTOR, ASSIGNMENT
00050 
00051 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00052 SoundSample::SoundSample(m_sample_count_type sampleCount,
00053             m_rate_type samplingRate,
00054             bool zeroData)
00055     :samplingRate_(samplingRate),data_(sampleCount)
00056 {
00057     if (zeroData)
00058     {
00059         for (m_sample_count_type s=0; s<sampleCount; s++)
00060         {
00061             data_[s] = 0.0;
00062         }
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00067 SoundSample::SoundSample(const SoundSample& ss)
00068     :samplingRate_(ss.samplingRate_), data_(ss.data_)
00069 {
00070 }
00071 
00072 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00073 SoundSample& SoundSample::operator=(const SoundSample& ss)
00074 {
00075     if (this != &ss) // beware self assignment
00076     {
00077         samplingRate_ = ss.samplingRate_;
00078         data_ = ss.data_;
00079     }
00080     return *this;
00081 }
00082 
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00084 SoundSample::~SoundSample()
00085 {
00086     // no dynamic data
00087 }

00093 void SoundSample::setSamplingRate(m_rate_type samplingRate)
00094 {
00095     samplingRate_ = samplingRate;
00096 }
00097 
00098 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00099 m_rate_type SoundSample::getSamplingRate()
00100 {
00101     return samplingRate_;
00102 }
00103 
00104 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00105 m_sample_count_type SoundSample::getSampleCount()
00106 {
00107     return data_.size();
00108 }
00109 
00110 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00111 m_sample_type& SoundSample::operator[](m_sample_count_type index)
00112 {
00113     return data_[index];
00114 }
00115 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00116 void SoundSample::composite(SoundSample& ss, m_time_type startTime)
00117 {
00118     // make sure both sound samples have the same sampling rate.
00119     if (samplingRate_ != ss.samplingRate_)
00120     {
00121         cerr << "ERROR: SoundSample::composite() "
00122              << "two SoundSamples have different sampling rates. "
00123              << "Bailing out." << endl;
00124         return;
00125     }
00126 
00127     // find the number of samples to composite
00128     m_sample_count_type samplesToCopy = ss.data_.size();
00129     m_sample_count_type samplesToSkip = 
00130         m_sample_count_type(startTime * float(samplingRate_));
00131     m_sample_count_type lengthNeeded = samplesToCopy + samplesToSkip;
00132     
00133     if ( m_sample_count_type(data_.size()) < lengthNeeded)
00134     {
00135         if ( m_sample_count_type(data_.size()) + MIN_CLIP_WARNING < lengthNeeded)
00136         {
00137             cerr << "WARNING: SoundSample::composite() "
00138                  << "sample being composited past end: "
00139                  << "clipping will occur." << endl;
00140         }
00141              
00142         samplesToCopy = 
00143             m_sample_count_type(data_.size()) - samplesToSkip;
00144             
00145         if (samplesToCopy <= 0) return;
00146     }
00147 
00148     // copy the data:
00149     for (m_sample_count_type s=0; s<samplesToCopy; s++)
00150     {
00151         data_[s+samplesToSkip] += ss.data_[s];
00152     }
00153 }
00154 
00155 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00156 //Iterator<m_sample_type> SoundSample::sampleIterator()
00157 //{
00158 //}
00159 
00160 
00161 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00162 void SoundSample::scale(m_value_type factor)
00163 {
00164     for(long i=0; i<data_.size(); i++)
00165     {
00166         data_[i] *= factor;
00167     }
00168 }
